title: Guinness® cheesecake
ingredients: ['Base', '60g (2 oz) unsalted butter, cubed', '125g (4 1/2 oz) digestive biscuits, crushed', 'Cheesecake mixture', '600ml (1 pint) of Guinness®', '200g sugar', '500g mascarpone cheese', '280ml whipped cream', '3 tbsp of honey', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '8 sheets of gelatine', '3 tbsp of water']
